item.description: What is a bug? It is a feature. History of bugs Share your bugs: https://youtu.be/h4pZZOmv4Qs what is a debugger why need one? what are the options â€‹ gdb is open source How to use gdb, a cool looking terminal based debugger? drafted since: 11 march 2018 baobab, diceware, and locate!

item.title: Use your Ram wisely!
item.description: Limiting Ram usage by browsers using cgroups when I was running my old p4 system on 1 gb ram. I have been using my 12 year old pentium 4 processor computer with 1.5GB ram and 1 GB of swap for last month with debian 9. It works smooth, way smoother than Windows equivalent. But here’s a glitch, as soon as I start browsing, the memory consumption reaches the highest peak. My system starts to hang and slow down as long the browser is open.
